boat.full_description:
The 35ft barge yacht Tiny Mite was built and designed by Frank, son of JW Shuttlewood, in 1956. She was one of the only smaller barge yachts to be spritsail-rigged. She was built for the Whittingham family of Rochford but by the 1960s/70s she was owned by the McDowell family of East End Paglesham who cruised her for many years on the East Coast.

Tiny mite was recently (2023) sold for £1 to a member of Leigh motor boat club. She had been lying in their compound for many years & is by all accounts in need of a considerable amount of work.
boat.name: Tiny Mite

ownerships.name: F A Cozens & S J Shalder
